game.title: The Lost Temple
game.description: A legendary temple has been discovered deep within the jungle. Rumors say it holds an ancient relic with immense power. Retrieve the artifact and bring it back to the village elder.

tasks.objective: Explore the jungle and find the temple entrance
tasks.description: Make your way through the dense jungle to locate the hidden entrance of the lost temple.

tasks.objective: Solve the ancient puzzle and unlock the inner sanctum
tasks.description: Once inside, find the ancient mechanism that guards the artifact and solve the puzzle to access it.
